list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the suppression or prohibition of any parts of books, films, news, etc. that are considered obscene, politically unacceptable, or a threat to security.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the regulation imposes censorship on all media
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Quy định áp đặt kiểm duyệt trên tất cả các phương tiện truyền thông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in ancient Rome) the office or position of censor.
